column4: Dr_Wills: It keeps returning a "DRDY_ERROR" or something similar, and won't boot.
that are errors from the sata/pata driver and can mean a dying hard drive loose cables etc depending on the exact wording of the errors
When I boot from my flash drive, the Ubuntu "slider bar" moves back and forth (9.04), but after a while, the terminal appears and keeps returning the DRDY_error
